sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <v-data-table :items="products" item-value="stock" class="elevation-1">
                    <template v-slot:header>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Product Name</th>
                            <th>Stock</th>
                            <th>Reorder Point</th>
                        </tr>
                    </template>
                    <template v-slot:[`item.stock`]="{ item }">
                        <v-chip :color="getStockColor(item.stock)">
                            {{ item.stock }}
                        </v-chip>
                    </template>
                </v-data-table>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'StockManagement',
    data() {
        return {
            headers: [
                { text: 'Product Name', value: 'name' },
                { text: 'Stock', value: 'stock' },
                { text: 'Reorder Point', value: 'reorderPoint' },
            ],
            products: [
            ],
        };
    },
    created() {
        this.fetchProducts();
    },
    methods: {

        async fetchProducts() {
            try {
                const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/products');
                if (!response.ok) {
                    throw new Error(`http error: ${response.status}`);
                }
                const product = await response.json();
                this.products = product;
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Failed to fetch products');
            }
        },

        getStockColor(stock) {
            return stock < 50 ? 'red' : 'green';
        },
    },
};
</script>
